divs: Sighting Detailsdriveing back to work from lunch i was on the back shore, atlantic rd. when i spotted the object over the ocean traveling at a high rate of speed, the silver disk like object had what seemed to be a tail or smoke following it. It soon disapeared. Monday morning i read the gloucester times and read reports from others the next day
trends: There have been 5 other sightings in Gloucester
There were no other sightings in Gloucester on or around June 12th 2008
Summary: silver disk like with a tail
